import { Badge } from '@astrojs/starlight/components'



The configuration object for TableX's settings.

**Object Properties**:

- checkForUpdates <Badge text="Required" variant="note" size="medium" />
- pageSize <Badge text="Required" variant="note" size="medium" />
- sqlEditor <Badge text="Required" variant="note" size="medium" />

### checkForUpdates

`boolean`

Wether to automatically check for updates or not.

### pageSize

`integer` formatted as `uint32`

Number of rows to be fetched per page.

### sqlEditor



[`SQLEditorSettings`](#sqleditorsettings)

Configuration for the SQL editor.

## Definitions

### CursorBlinkingStyle

`"blink"` | `"expand"` | `"smooth"` | `"solid"` | `"phase"`

Behavior of the cursor blinking style.

### EditorScrollBarVisibility



Vertical/Horizontal scrollbar visibility.

**Object Properties**:

- horizontal <Badge text="Required" variant="note" size="medium" />
- vertical <Badge text="Required" variant="note" size="medium" />

##### horizontal



[`Visibility`](#visibility)

Toggle horizontal scrollbar visibility.

##### vertical



[`Visibility`](#visibility)

Toggle vertical scrollbar visibility.

### SQLEditorSettings



Configuration for the SQL editor.

**Object Properties**:

- cursorBlinking <Badge text="Required" variant="note" size="medium" />
- fontSize <Badge text="Required" variant="note" size="medium" />
- minimap <Badge text="Required" variant="note" size="medium" />
- scrollbar <Badge text="Required" variant="note" size="medium" />

##### cursorBlinking



[`CursorBlinkingStyle`](#cursorblinkingstyle)

Behavior of the cursor blinking style.

##### fontSize

`integer` formatted as `uint8`

Editor font size.

##### minimap

`boolean`

Visibility of the right-hand-side minimap.

##### scrollbar



[`EditorScrollBarVisibility`](#editorscrollbarvisibility)

Vertical/Horizontal scrollbar visibility.

### Visibility

`"hidden"` | `"visible"` | `"auto"`

General visibility settings.
